comment.author: 35687899@N00
comment._content: Less than a week before, O'Carroll and other Wobblies were clubbed and arrested by the New York police for demonstrations in Union Square: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F10C12FA3D5E13...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of April 12, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E6DA133DE333A... describes the 4/11/1914 demonstration.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan and swanq: Thanks for linking these images to the IWW rally in NYC.  We'll include this info. in the records next time we update.
